```{r cars}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)


ggplot(Fecundity1, aes(x = species)) + 
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12)

Fecundity1 <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(count !="NA") %>% transform(count = as.numeric(count))
acwr <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "AC")
brma <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "BR")
homu <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "HO")
femi <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "FE")
laca <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "LA")
naat <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "NA")
pler <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "PL")
saco <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "SA")
urli <- Fecundity1 %>% filter(species == "UR")

summary(acwr$count) 
quantile(acwr$count, prob=c(.25,.5,.75), na.rm=TRUE)

Fecundity1 %>% group_by(species) %>% summarise(avg = mean(count), min = min(count), max=max(count))


df <- data.frame(species = c("AC","BR","HO","FE","LA","PL","SA","UR"),
  Var= c(var(acwr$count), var(brma$count),var(homu$count),var(femi$count),var(laca$count),var(pler$count),var(saco$count),var(urli$count)),
  SD= c(sd(acwr$count), sd(brma$count),sd(homu$count),sd(femi$count),sd(laca$count),sd(pler$count),sd(saco$count),sd(urli$count))
)
df

ggplot(acwr, aes(x=count)) + geom_histogram(stat="count") + theme_minimal()

```
